review: I asked before buying it if it will work in foreign countries as Mexico as answer roku told me almost all channels will work (circa 90%), once I received the item, only crappy channels can be seen, not even netflix or vudu that normally works at Mexico in a lap top or other devices...ESPN, Amazon any other good channels can be seen.I alert buyers from other countries to not buy this thing and also don't trust 100% what support say at Roku web page...

author: Daniel W. Anderson

review: So, I purchased this as a Father's Day gift for my dad, so he could watch Netflix on his 32" lcd tv that is a few years old, and not smart. When it finally got here I was so happy for dad. That happiness lasted about 10 minutes, the amount of time it took me to realize that I cannot add Netflix to my Roku stick, because of region restrictions. I contacted the Roku support team, because there is  absolutely NO HINT in their site or anywhere that states that I would be having this issue, and they basically told me that I had thrown $49 down the pipe. This is completely useless to me without Netflix, and like I told the customer support rep, it is a scam that they don't let u know about the regions restrictions BEFORE you purchase the product, so you can make up your mind and decide if you still want to purchase this.I hate that they didn't give me any options to fix my issue, and did not show any type of empathy towards it. Lesson learned!!
author: Jonathan Gonzalvo
